skillTree.name: Asrai Spear
skillTree.description: When deadly Asrai spears are wielded, the wardance is an intricate performance ending in the foes' death.

effects.description:
Weapon choice: "Asrai Spear"
	
	Extra weapon choices are automatically unlocked when an agent is recruited, but must be manually enabled from Character Details panel.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Talismanic Tattoos
skillTree.description: Forgoing armour, the Shadowdancers decorate themselves with swirling designs and dye their hair in bright colours.

skillTree.name: Touched by Loec
skillTree.description: Wardancer troupes are commonly led by a veteran Shadowdancer, these warriors fight to Loec's silent song.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Wardancer and Bladesinger units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Stalk for Wardancer and Bladesinger units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Pathfinder
skillTree.description: They, and only they, know all the paths through Athel Loren — indeed, it is said that they tread the paths of the Dreaming Wood as surely as they do the mortal world.

effects.description:
Evasion chance when using the Worldroots: +5%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.name: Priest of Loec
skillTree.description: Shadowdancers are the closest thing that the Trickster God has to a priesthood, and they are both respected and feared as a result.

effects.description:
Barrier hit points: +500 for Wardancer and Bladesinger units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: The Enfeebling Foe
skillTree.description: When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

skillTree.name: Dance of Death
skillTree.description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Conviction
skillTree.description: Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.

skillTree.name: Impenetrable Bark
skillTree.description: Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.

skillTree.name: Endurance of the Oak
skillTree.description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Tempered Rigour
skillTree.description: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.

skillTree.name: Violent Delights
skillTree.description: There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.

skillTree.name: Dance of Loec
skillTree.description: This ritualistic war dance requires neither rhythm nor order, enabling evasion of the enemy’s clumsy attacks, and lethal counterattacks.

skillTree.name: Storm of Blades
skillTree.description: The Shadowdancer rain blow after blow upon their opponent, moving with such speed that the eye cannot follow each distinct cut and thrust.

skillTree.name: Whirling Death
skillTree.description: Each strike of a Shadowdancer's blade is made with uncanny precision, capable of severing a head or piercing a heart with one deceptively elegant stroke.

skillTree.name: Possessed by the Trickster God
skillTree.description: Once consumed by Loec’s aspect, one can instinctively evade attack through trickery, mimicking his deception of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Possessed by the Trickster God"

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Vigorous
backgroundSkills.description: This one is not at all easy to kill, and many have tried, believe me.

backgroundSkills.name: Medic
backgroundSkills.description: "I see something wrong and I fix it with my hands."

effects.description:
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Healer
backgroundSkills.description: Armies can be mended as surely as people can, up to a point of course.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

backgroundSkills.name: Crushing
backgroundSkills.description: On occasion, throwing the whole nine leagues at the enemy is just the ticket.

backgroundSkills.name: Incendiary
backgroundSkills.description: You don't want to be on the wrong side of this one's ire - it's explosive to say the least!

backgroundSkills.name: Trickster
backgroundSkills.description: This one utilizes illusions and other tricks, which she inevitably uses to further distract her foes or mete out a much-needed dose of humility to Elves or spirits that have forgotten their station.

backgroundSkills.name: Dazzlingly Swift
backgroundSkills.description: In battle, Shadowdancers are even more dazzlingly swift than other Wardancers.

backgroundSkills.name: Discreet
backgroundSkills.description: A secret kept is a favour to be returned at a later time.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
	(enemy characters in region)

backgroundSkills.name: Ariel's Favoured
backgroundSkills.description: The Shadowdancer's actions have gleaned the favour of the Queen of Athel Loren.

backgroundSkills.name: Fecund
backgroundSkills.description: Never short of new ideas, or new ways of looking at old problems.

backgroundSkills.name: Guardian
backgroundSkills.description: As a guardian, the Warrioress is sworn to protect everything that Asrai hold dear.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.name: Spear Master
backgroundSkills.description: This warrior is one with their spear; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Bonus vs. Large: +8 (when using Asrai Spear)

Recruit rank: +1 for Wardancers (Asrai Spears)
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Sword Master
backgroundSkills.description: This warrior is one with their swords; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Bonus vs. Infantry: +8 (when using Dual Swords)

Recruit rank: +1 for Wardancers (Dual Swords)
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Diplomatic
backgroundSkills.description: As an envoy of Ariel, the Shadowdancer speaks with the authority of the Queen of Athel Loren.
